suggestions.original: To enhance the line texture in the artwork, consider adding more detailed and varied line work to the cup to match the level of detail seen in the dog's fur. This will create a more cohesive and balanced composition. Additionally, refining the lines on the kennel and pillow with subtle variations can add depth and interest to these elements, making the overall scene more dynamic.
